◆ CANRX_CurrentSensor()

uint32_t CANRX_CurrentSensor ( CAN_MESSAGE_PROPERTIES_s  message,
const uint8_t *const  kpkCanData,
const CAN_SHIM_s *const  kpkCanShim 
)

can rx callback function for current sensor measurements

Parameters
[in]messagecontains the message ID, DLC and endianness
[in]kpkCanDatapayload of can frame
[in]kpkCanShimshim to the database entries

CAN signals used in this message Parameters: bit start, bit length, factor, offset, minimum value, maximum value
